name: Improved MySpace Annoyance Remover 2 - Profile 2.0
description:
Some improvements added to the MySpace Ad/Annoyance Remover (http://userstyles.org/styles/2178)-- The best one I've seen.

Adds and Google Search bars removed from Profile 2.0 pages also.

Version 02 includes some extra edits for some new changes as of 12/25/08

Enjoy!
